item.title: Licton Springs' Own Pilgrim Coffeehouse Featured On Food Network!
item.description:
Big congratulations to Justin Shaheen and the folks at Pilgrim Coffeehouse who were recently included in a roundup on Food Network's website: 50 States of Food Trucks!

Be sure to visit their Facebook page for where to find the truck each week.
item.dc:creator: amandacrosley

item.title: Teriyaki Taste Test!
item.description: In Seattle, we all LOVE good Teriyaki. Licton Springs is no exception, and we are lucky to have at least 4 Teriyaki places within our < 1 square mile neighborhood. With so many to choose from it can be difficult to know which one to try out. So, we decided to …
item.dc:creator: timothycrosley

item.title: El Patio replaces Tropicos Breeze
item.description:
Serving up delicious Latin Cuisine right on Aurora Avenue, Tropicos Breeze has long been one of Licton Spring's most beloved restaurants. So, when I was told the Licton Springs location had closed, I feared the worse.

Rushing to the restaurant after work, I was greeted not by Tropicos Breeze, but …
item.dc:creator: timothycrosley
